Summary: Star brightly changing colors red, blue, white etc. for over an hour
divs: Sighting DetailsUFO over Salt Lake City - flashing bright color lights - Oct 23, 2013 in the western sky from Hollday, UT 84124, I videotaped over an hour of this very bright and far away object, from 7:30 PM to 8:30 PM it was approximately where I usually see Venus in the night sky. It rotatated out of frame like a planet. A party at the Black Diamond Center provided the background and music.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Holladay
There were no other sightings in Holladay on or around October 23rd 2013
